thread.title: Guerrilla Journalist Turns The Camera On CNN With ‘#CNNLeaks’
thread.title_full: Guerrilla Journalist Turns The Camera On CNN With ‘#CNNLeaks’

author: Jack Davis
title: Guerrilla Journalist Turns The Camera On CNN With ‘#CNNLeaks’
text:
Beyond just CNN, “the media is a huge target of mine right now,” O’Keefe said. Retweeted James O'Keefe ( @JamesOKeefeIII ): 
— John Heidenreich (@GrovelandJohn) February 22, 2017 
“We’ve had people on the inside come to us. Just like Julian Assange has people come to him, we’ve had people, sources, come to us and give us information, and we’re going to be releasing it ‘WikiLeaks style’ this week,” O’Keefe told Fox News host Sean Hannity Monday on Hannity’s nationally syndicated radio show. Advertisement – story continues below 
During the interview, O’Keefe wouldn’t say which media organization he had footage from, only telling Hannity it was “one that Trump has been really talking about.” 
“So it’s CNN,” Hannity quickly surmised. 
O’Keefe told CNN Wednesday that he has “a few hundred hours” of “secretly recorded material” from inside the network. “We’re calling it CNN Leaks,” he said. Advertisement - story continues below
